results.title: Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES - Chinadaily.com.cn
results.content: Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES). At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous ...
results.raw_content:
Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES
Event lifts the curtain on future of AI, displays, autonomous driving, robots
By FAN FEIFEI and MA SI |
CHINA DAILY |
Updated: 2024-01-10 07:27
Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES).
At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous driving, robots to augmented reality.
Highlighting that China is playing an increasingly vital role in bolstering technological innovation, experts said intelligent devices powered by generative AI and the internet of things are expected to become a key growth driver for global consumer electronics industry.
According to the US Consumer Technology Association, which organizes the event, more than 4,000 enterprises from across the globe are participating in the CES, which opened on Tuesday and will conclude on Friday. Of these, 1,114 are from China and 1,201 are based in the US.
AI-powered terminal devices are attracting attention this year amid a worldwide frenzy over the ChatGPT chatbot. Chinese consumer electronics maker TCL demonstrated over 120 pieces of intelligent hardware covering quantum dot mini-LED TVs, AI processing chips, smartphones, intelligent AR goggles and vehicle-mounted display products.
The company is accelerating efforts to expand presence in North America by boosting production capacity at its Mexican factory, given that building global competitiveness has always been important for TCL.
Hisense Group, a major Chinese home appliance manufacturer, unveiled its latest ultra light-emitting diode or ULED TV and laser display technology at the CES.
David Gold, vice-president of Hisense International, said at a product launch event that display technology is widely applied in sports, education and medical fields, continuously pushing technological boundaries.
Lenovo Group Ltd, the world's largest personal computer maker, unveiled a full lineup of more than 40 new devices and solutions powered by AI at the CES. It said it believes this year will mark the advent of AI-based PCs.
Xpeng AeroHT, an affiliate of China's Xpeng Motors, showcased its pilotless flying car, an electric vertical takeoff and landing, or eVTOL, aircraft at the CES.
"Chinese tech companies are at the forefront of technological innovation globally, and actively promoting the application of AI in consumer electronics, intelligent devices and electric vehicles," said Hong Yong, a researcher at the Chinese Academy of International Trade and Economic Cooperation.
The latest technological breakthroughs made by Chinese companies in the fields of virtual reality and autonomous driving also reflect their strengths and innovative capabilities in crucial technologies, which will be conducive to industrial upgrades and boosting their own competitiveness on the global stage, Hong said.
Chinese augmented reality company Xreal showcased its latest AR-enabled innovative products by partnering with companies such as Qualcomm and BMW.
CES attendees can join a Las Vegas tour hosted by BMW, where they will have the opportunity to experience Xreal's AR glasses along the way. They can witness how in-car information, including navigation cues, hazard warnings, entertainment content and charging station details seamlessly integrate into the real environment through Xreal Air 2 glasses.
Jin Peng, co-founder of Xreal, said, "In the future world, whether it's in offices or entertainment, for mobile commuting or personal enjoyment, people will engage in work and experience life in new and creative ways."
Chinese tech companies have shown the potential to lead the industry not only in mature categories such as smartphones, but also in emerging fields such as artificial intelligence of things, AR and VR, said Pan Helin, co-director of the Digital Economy and Financial Innovation Research Center at Zhejiang University's International Business School.
Contact the writers at fanfeifei@chinadaily.com.cn

results.title: Light peak technology debut CES 2024, China's automotive optical ...
results.content: the international consumer electronics show (CES 2024), the world's largest consumer electronics show known as the "science and technology spring festival gala", was held in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9 to 12 local time. as the world's most influential science and technology event, CES 2024 theme is "ALL TOGETHER.
results.raw_content:
star50
Entering 2024, we will first usher in the annual opening feast of the global science and technology community.
the international consumer electronics show (CES 2024), the world's largest consumer electronics show known as the "science and technology spring festival gala", was held in Las Vegas, USA, from January 9 to 12 local time.
as the world's most influential science and technology event, CES 2024 theme is "ALL TOGETHER. ALL ON.", emphasizing the promotion of sustainable development of mankind through science and technology. There is no doubt that there are all kinds of cutting-edge "black technologies" at CES every year. In the past few years, the concepts, technologies and products exhibited at CES each year will influence or even dominate the wind direction of the technology industry in the next period of time.
CES 2024 has thousands of enterprises participating in the exhibition, with great momentum, rich scenes and hard core of science and technology. A significant change is that Chinese enterprises are gradually changing from "followers" to "leaders". Many Chinese enterprises are doing their best. Among them, Guangfeng Technology (688007.SH), the first listed company on the Science and Technology Innovation Board, has reappeared at CES with its on-board optics and home laser display core devices to show the world the innovative power of Chinese science and technology.
During CES, Li Yi, founder, chairman and CEO of Guangfeng Technology, said in an interview with Agence France-Presse, "For science and technology companies, the global market is still full of opportunities and challenges, especially core devices with key technologies. Manufacturers still have new opportunities." Prior to this, international media including CNBC (US Consumer News and Business Channel) and The Economist (International News and Business Week published in the UK) have also interviewed and reported Guangfeng Technology many times.
The world's first vehicle-level projection giant screen
According to statistics and analysis by the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers, from January to November 2023, my country's production and sales of new energy vehicles reached 8.426 million and 8.304 million respectively, a year-on-year increase of 34.5 and 36.7 respectively, and a market share of 30.8. Continuous double growth in production and sales. It is worth pointing out that China's export volume of new energy vehicles has increased significantly, with 1.091 million new energy vehicles exported from January to November 2023, an increase of 83.5 percent over the same period last year.
As the world's leading enterprise in the field of laser display technology, Light Peak Technology has independently developed ALPD semiconductor laser light source technology, and has achieved industrial applications in the fields of cinema projection, professional display, and home projection. Not only that, Guangfeng Technology has also successfully passed the international car regulations certification, and the original ALPD technology has become the only laser display core technology that meets the requirements of car regulations.
In 2021, Guangfeng Technology became an excellent partner of Huawei's smart car solutions. At the beginning of last year, it announced that it had obtained the "Notice of Development Designation" from Selis and became a supplier of Selis automotive automotive optical solutions.
on December 26, 2023, panoramic smart flagship SUV asked the world M9 to be officially unveiled. the car is equipped with the industry's first 32-inch projection giant screen of the car gauge grade. the core components are provided by light peak technology. the laser display has a 100% P3 color gamut. the giant screen can hover at will and be retractable. the Rhine eye protection comfort certification and Swiss SGS anti-halo certification ensure that long-term viewing will not hurt eyes and carsickness, it can also be viewed stably during the driving of the vehicle.
the car's projection giant screen supports mobile phones, MagLink mirror projection screens, and Huawei's rhinoceros pointing remote control. Let the spacious back space be transformed into a home fun cinema, a football bar for gathering, an electric competition room for playing, a large room for exclusive enjoyment and a private conference room. It fully meets the needs of entertainment and privacy in the car.
media reports show that only seven days after the pre-sale was started, the M9 will break through 30000 vehicles, breaking new records. at the same time, industrial chain enterprises such as guangfeng technology will also usher in a new round of outbreak.
Two major applications and three major products meet multiple needs
With the continuous upgrading of automobile intelligence, the interaction between cars and people has become the focus of attention. Cars are no longer just a means of transportation, but gradually have multiple attributes such as social, office, and entertainment. Cars will become living space and work space. In addition to the "third space", the trend of entertainment and specialization is strengthening.
for the automotive market, light peak technology around immersive AR display and digital intelligent lighting two major directions, in the vehicle display, laser headlights and AR-HUD three product lines to launch a variety of solutions. In terms of on-board display, solutions include sky screen projection, side window projection, smart surface, large screen projection and other applications, which can be projected on any surface with high practicability.
as early as last January's CES exhibition in the United States, BMW group brought the world premiere of the I digital emotional interaction concept car (Dee), which was unveiled on the spot. the four-window fusion display technology provided the core device to show its future conception of human-vehicle interaction and digital experience. Among them, it is quite interesting that when the driver approaches the vehicle, the window will project the virtual image of the driver and interact with each other. The core device of the window display is provided by Light Peak Technology.
(BMW I digital emotion interactive concept car side window display)
Compared with the traditional display scheme, light peak technology has obvious advantages in four aspects: small volume, non-marking display, high-quality display and augmented reality display. The vehicle-mounted light machine based on ALPD technology has the advantages of high light efficiency, wide color gamut and small volume and strong stability.
Enabling car companies to carry out fixed-point cooperation
According to the US Wall Street Journal, BYD sold more than 526000 pure electric vehicles in the fourth quarter of 2023. The quarterly sales of Chinese automakers surpassed Tesla for the first time, and BYD was able to become the world's largest seller of electric vehicles. This marks China's emerging strength in the global electric vehicle market.
China's automobile power is surging. Guangfeng Technology is seizing the opportunity to enable intelligent application of automobile enterprises with core technologies. It is not only BYD's supplier of automobile optical core devices, but also passed IATF 16949 International Automobile Quality Management System Certification as early as April 2022. It has successively obtained designated cooperation from domestic and foreign leading automobile enterprises and first-class suppliers including BYD, such as Selis, BAIC New Energy and Huayu Vision.
Public information shows that as of September 30, 2023, the cumulative number of authorizations and applications for patents related to on-board optical technology alone reached 191, an increase of 39.41 year-on-year. The company's laser light source technology has been granted more than 1900 patents worldwide.
at the CES 2024 site, Li yi told reporters that in CES, a world-class technology show, guangfeng technology insisted on continuously presenting core technologies and core devices. this year, it focused on showing the latest research and development results of the company's on-board core devices to international customers, enabling customers to land in brand-new application scenarios with technology. "At present, we are in the process of pushing forward the delivery of our products. In this conference, we actively communicate with the head car companies in North America, Europe and other places, and establish good customer contacts."

results.title: About Us - Trace Optical
results.content: Professional Lens Manufacturer The company has a complete manufacturing system from lens processing, aspheric lens injection, optical coating, lens assembly & inspection. Meanwhile, the company shipped 20 million lenses in 2019, ranking NO.1 in the country in terms of lens shipments in the automotive consumer sector. Please provide content
results.raw_content:
About Trace Optical
Shenzhen Branch of Jiangxi Trace Optical Co., Ltd specializes in R&D, manufacturing and sales of various fixed & zoom optical lenses. The company has a Shenzhen R&D center and a Long Nan (Ganzhou) business department. It has a group of experienced optical technology experts and senior engineers. Based on optical design, it has been focusing on the field of wide-angle optics for 10 years and has more than 80 optical patents.
Trace Optical’s products mainly focus on the fields of vehicle imaging, car DVR, smart home, IPC surveillance, 360°VR/AR, drone，sports DV customized camera lens etc.
Professional Lens Manufacturer
The company has a complete manufacturing system from lens processing, aspheric lens injection, optical coating, lens assembly & inspection. Meanwhile, the company shipped 20 million lenses in 2019, ranking NO.1 in the country in terms of lens shipments in the automotive consumer sector.

results.title: Chinese products shine at CES 2024 - Chinadaily.com.cn
results.content: Chinese products shine at CES 2024. The 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES), the world's premier tech show, kicked off in the US city of Las Vegas on Tuesday. The annual event, running from ...
results.raw_content:
Chinese products shine at CES 2024
The 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES), the world's premier tech show, kicked off in the US city of Las Vegas on Tuesday.
The annual event, running from Tuesday to Friday, has attracted more than 130,000 attendees and over 4,000 exhibitors from more than 150 countries and regions, including over 1,200 startups, according to the Consumer Technology Association (CTA), the organizer of the CES.
The number of attendees has gone up from about 115,000 last year and 45,000 in 2022, according to CTA.
A blend of cutting-edge technologies, new launches and quirky gadgets are expected to swarm the show floor, showcasing the latest trends and innovation in the consumer electronics industries.
Chinese companies have been important forces at CES in recent years, impressing global exhibitors with innovative products and solutions, with over 1,100 Chinese companies and their overseas branches participating in the tech show.

results.raw_content:
ABOUT
About Us
Jiangxi Jingchao Optical Co., Ltd. was established on December 12, 2017 with a registered capital of 100 million yuan. It is mainly engaged in the research and development and production of high-pixel optical lenses. The product structure covers 8P, corresponding to pixels 2M~108M, and provideshigh-quality optical products for global clients.The optical solutions are widely used in mobile phones, vehicles and other products.
Since its establishment 4 years ago, the company's business has grown rapidly. In 2019, 6P (48M) mass production has been achieved, and more than 50 million units have been shipped. The 7P lens samples already sampled in December 2020, and 200 million units already shipped out in 2020. above. As of the end of 2021, we already have more than 1,000 patents of various types, and is growing at a rate of more than 100 per year, which can provide customers with patent protection. The company is based in China and has a global layout. It has research and development teams in Taiwan, South Korea, and Japan, and empowers the company's innovation in optical design, production line automation, and optical basic material research. Able to provide customers with professional, high-quality solutions and product services.
The company adheres to the core values of "all for customers, All for Clients, All for Success, All for Result", with the business philosophy of "running a 100-meter marathon", insisting on the quality concept “Quality is the blood of enterprise" and the quality concept, and will continue to manufacture optical lenses. Intensive cultivation in the field, with the spirit of ingenuity to create the ultimate products and services, to create higher value for customers.
